verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> hast been <S%H1961><s%> our dwelling place <S%H4583><s%> in all generations. <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were brought forth, <S%H3205><s%> or ever thou hadst formed <S%H2342><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the world, <S%H8398><s%> even from everlasting <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting, <S%H5769><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art God. <S%H410><s%>
Thou turnest <S%H7725><s%> man <S%H582><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> destruction; <S%H1793><s%> and sayest, <S%H559><s%> Return, <S%H7725><s%> ye children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%> are but as yesterday <S%H3117><s%> <S%H865><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it is past, <S%H5674><s%> and as a watch <S%H821><s%> in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
Thou carriest them away as with a flood; <S%H2229><s%> they are <S%H1961><s%> as a sleep: <S%H8142><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> they are like grass <S%H2682><s%> which groweth up. <S%H2498><s%>
In the morning <S%H1242><s%> it flourisheth, <S%H6692><s%> and groweth up; <S%H2498><s%> in the evening <S%H6153><s%> it is cut down, <S%H4135><s%> and withereth. <S%H3001><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> we are consumed <S%H3615><s%> by thine anger, <S%H639><s%> and by thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> are we troubled. <S%H926><s%>
Thou hast set <S%H7896><s%> our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> thee, our secret <S%H5956><s%> sins in the light <S%H3974><s%> of thy countenance. <S%H6440><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our days <S%H3117><s%> are passed away <S%H6437><s%> in thy wrath: <S%H5678><s%> we spend <S%H3615><s%> our years <S%H8141><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> a tale <S%H1899><s%> that is told.

The days <S%H3117><s%> of our years <S%H8141><s%> are threescore years and ten; <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> by reason of strength <S%H1369><s%> they be fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> yet is their strength <S%H7296><s%> labor <S%H5999><s%> and sorrow; <S%H205><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is soon <S%H2440><s%> cut off, <S%H1468><s%> and we fly away. <S%H5774><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the power <S%H5797><s%> of thine anger? <S%H639><s%> even according to thy fear, <S%H3374><s%> so is thy wrath. <S%H5678><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> teach <S%H3045><s%> us to number <S%H4487><s%> our days, <S%H3117><s%> that we may apply <S%H935><s%> our hearts <S%H3824><s%> unto wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
Return, <S%H7725><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> how long? <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> and let it repent <S%H5162><s%> thee concerning <S%H5921><s%> thy servants. <S%H5650><s%>
O satisfy <S%H7646><s%> us early <S%H1242><s%> with thy mercy; <S%H2617><s%> that we may rejoice <S%H7442><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> our days. <S%H3117><s%>
Make us glad <S%H8055><s%> according to the days <S%H3117><s%> wherein thou hast afflicted <S%H6031><s%> us, and the years <S%H8141><s%> wherein we have seen <S%H7200><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>
Let thy work <S%H6467><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> and thy glory <S%H1926><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> their children. <S%H1121><s%>

And let the beauty <S%H5278><s%> of the LORD <S%H136><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us: and establish <S%H3559><s%> thou the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us; yea, the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%> establish <S%H3559><s%> thou it.
